message: Need recommendation for affordable best geek watch. What do you recommend?
so i don't have to carry the phone to track distances

Get a Timex or a Rolex. Get an Iphone for everything else. Either get the utility of a Timex (inexpensive replace as needed) or the utility of a Rolex(expensive but you will never have to buy another watch). I spent more on buying and replacing $200-$500 watches in 10 years than I finally paid for a Rolex.
i've been thinking about getting one of these for running: http://nikerunning.nike.com/nikeos/p/nikeplus/en_EMEA/sportband
What about a TikTok or LunaTik for your iPod nano? http://lunatik.com/ I have both, and while they're somewhat impractical, they're pretty geeky.

This is my watch since 2005 : http://www.led-watch.com/ustx6.htm I'd recommend picking up a pair of them as they break or change the strap as soon as you get it. Cheap and sublimely geeky. Also builds a retro-chiq patina over years of usage. :)
Bought an automatic Tissot in high school. Still runs well and looks good.
